titleStmt.title: An account of W. Penn's travails in Holland and Germany, anno MDCLXXVII, for the service of the Gospel of Christ, by way of journal containing also divers letters and epistles writ to several great and eminent persons whilst there.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
Penn, William, 1644-1718. To the churches of Jesus throughout the world.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the churches of Jesus throughout the world" (p. [59]-90) has special t.p. dated 1677.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
